props.name: Slider minimum value
props.descr: The minimum value of the slider (default is 1)

props.name: Slider maximum value
props.descr: The maximum value of the slider (default is 1)

props.name: Slider increments (steps)
props.descr: How many points should the handle take on move (from 0.00001 as a smallest value to N)

props.name: Handle start position off the slider
props.descr: When true, the handle will be just outside the slider

props.name: Pips type
props.descr: Show the steps as pips or custom values

props.name: Clickable pips
props.descr: Allow respondents to click on main pips

props.name: Show OptOut
props.descr: Show or hide OptOut button

props.name: Show Prefix
props.descr: Show hide prefix

props.name: Show Suffix
props.descr: Show hide suffix

props.name: Highlighting pips
props.descr: Marked main pips will be highlighted red

props.name: Vertical labels
props.descr: Change orientation of pips to vertical

props.name: OptOut big button
props.descr: Match the OptOut to fit the slider

props.name: Custom pips labels
props.descr: Allow for custom pips labels

props.name: Slider labels
props.descr: Create custom text for the labels at the chosen positions (separated by a pipe '|')

props.name: Slider label positions
props.descr: Define the individual slider label positions with the values as text (i.e.  '1,2,3,4,5,6,7' )

props.name: Pips prefix
props.descr: Main pips prefix

props.name: Pips suffix
props.descr: Main pips suffix

props.name: OptOut custom text
props.descr: OptOut button custom text

props.name: OptOut custom value
props.descr: Custom value of OptOut button (default is -99999)

props.name: Density of pips
props.descr: Defines the density of the pips (if equal to size, pips will appear on each step)

props.name: Decimal values length
props.descr: Specifies Adding decimal point and digit

props.name: Pips Decimals
props.descr: Specify how many decimals post the pips value

props.name: Pre script
props.descr: Javascript to execute pre render

props.name: Post script
props.descr: Javascript to execute post render
